detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BSCBridge.sol#394-400):
	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BSCBridge.sol#398)

Low level call in Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BSCBridge.sol#460-481):
	- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BSCBridge.sol#464)

owner() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BSCBridge.sol#63-65)

renounceOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.renounceOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BSCBridge.sol#82-85)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BSCBridge.sol#91-95)

transferOut(IERC20,uint256) should be declared external:
	- BSCBridge.transferOut(IERC20,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BSCBridge.sol#574-578)
